extendedInfo.description: ***This is a top 100 game - Kids just love popsicle and ice candy making*** Hey Popsicle and Ice Pop lovers! Get ready to unleash your creativity and create ice candy of your dreams.  Refresh yourself with nice cold juicy yummy ice pop candy. Learn how you can make it at home! Crush some fruit and ice. Mix it, shake it, pour it, insert your favorite wood stick and freeze it in a custom mold shape. Coat it with different toppings, sprinkle, put on some decorations with paper umbrellas and other little toys for your young ones to play with. And in the end get ready for the fun part - eat your ice pop candy!!!!This ice candy maker includes: 6 types of flavors in different combinations and more coming soon- strawberry, cherry, lemon, orange, banana, kiwi, watermelon and blueberry. Sandwich your ice candy in tasty toppings and decorations.Make your ultimate ice pop candy from Nutty Apps- the makers of the best ice cream maker, sundae maker games on Android. Make someone smile today - Create an ice candy pop and share with them for their Happy Birthday or other occasion. Show off your ice cream decorating skills to your family and friends via Facebook.Fun ice cream sundae decorating game for kids of all ages. With this free ice cream maker app, everyday can be an ice candy day - go wild!This app is appropriate for everyone: babies, toddlers, children and even adults who like cooking, making and serving ice cream- or just eating  it! Ice Candy Maker is the best ice pop making, ice cream sundae making game available for your Android phone. App supports Android 2.2(Froyo) to Android 4.x Ice Cream Sandwich and Jellybeans.===== FEATURES=====- Multiple flavors to make ice candy!- Choose different shapes for your ice candy.- Over 12 different ice candy fudge / frosting.- Share via Facebook- Eat your ice candy- Continued improvement of this app, please send us feedback or suggestions.- Beautiful high quality HD graphics- Intuitive, easy to use interface with draggable items for better positioning- Infinite game play with unlimited combinations- Umbrellas and other toys for decoration- Screenshots of ice pops can be saved in your photo gallery or share with friends on Facebook ============================================================PRIVACY POLICY:As a designer of kidsâ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: www.nuttyapps.com/privacypolicy.IN-APP PURCHASES:Â This app lets you purchase digital content using actual money. On Google Wallet, you can configure parental controls to avoid unintentional purchases.NEED HELP?Contact us with any questions or comments: nuttyfeedback@gmail.com============================================================NOTE: Not all items will be available for donut making at launch. Will be pushed in later versionsApp supports Android 2.2 (Froyo) to Android 4.x Ice Cream Sandwich and Jellybeans.DISCLAIMER:All BGMs are the property of Kevin MacLeod.
